content.description: A 95 percent confidence interval for the proportion difference <math alttext="p sub 1 minus p sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> was calculated to be <math alttext="negative 0.12 comma 0.17" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.12</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>0.17</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: Which of the following conclusions is supported by the interval?

choices.label: There is evidence to conclude that <math alttext="p sub 1 is greater than p sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> because 0.17 is greater than <math alttext="negative 0.12" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.12</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.

There is evidence to conclude that <math alttext="p sub 2 is greater than p sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> because 0.17 is greater than 0.12.

There is evidence to conclude that <math alttext="p sub 1 is greater than p sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> because the range of positive values in the interval is greater than the range of negative values.

There is evidence to conclude that <math alttext="p sub 2 is greater than p sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> because the range of positive values in the interval is greater than the range of negative values.
There is not sufficient evidence to determine which proportion is greater.

content.answer: There is not sufficient evidence to determine which proportion is greater.

topic.text: 6.9: Justifying a Claim Based on a Confidence Interval for a Difference Between Population Proportions

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Justify a claim based on a confidence interval.
